title: Question:
author: roksana.hee
content: I want to sell a sports-related amazon affiliate site. If anyone wants to buy the affiliate site. You can knock me asap.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Can you DM me in telegram- @LT_Mouse

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Well, at least show your site's statistics for previous months or your monthly average income in the past 3 months in a form of images. This will give lots benefits for both party, you and your future client/buyer.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Hi I can be potentially interested but please provide more details and show some data (much better on public so everyone is aware...):price requested? what affiliations did you have (what country/site?) crypto sportbook or fiat?statistics about traffic like daily visits/clicks on banner--- monthly year profit?expenses for domain/hosting/promotion/banner/other advertising?did you have also social networks linked to your site?how much times you are running this site? how many people / time dedicated to the site?

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: if you don't want to give this information publicly, send me more information about the site. bitbollo has already listed some of the important informationOf course, I assume that it is a site in English.txQuote from: bitbollo on January 27, 2023, 11:59:00 AMHi I can be potentially interested but please provide more details and show some data (much better on public so everyone is aware...):price requested? what affiliations did you have (what country/site?) crypto sportbook or fiat?statistics about traffic like daily visits/clicks on banner--- monthly year profit?expenses for domain/hosting/promotion/banner/other advertising?did you have also social networks linked to your site?how much times you are running this site? how many people / time dedicated to the site?

comments.author: bnbstorm
comments.body: Quote from: bitbollo on January 27, 2023, 11:59:00 AMHi I can be potentially interested but please provide more details and show some data (much better on public so everyone is aware...):price requested? what affiliations did you have (what country/site?) crypto sportbook or fiat?statistics about traffic like daily visits/clicks on banner--- monthly year profit?expenses for domain/hosting/promotion/banner/other advertising?did you have also social networks linked to your site?how much times you are running this site? how many people / time dedicated to the site?I think OP meant that they are selling Amazon affiliate website of Sports product. Like you will list products related to sports like ball, bats, kits etc from Amazon and get commission if people buy from it. Read more about it here.This is just my understanding. Maybe OP meant something else. If it is something else OP should inform here and answer above questions.

comments.author: pawel7777
comments.body: Quote from: roksana.hee on January 27, 2023, 11:53:15 AMQuote from: Little Mouse on January 27, 2023, 09:54:39 AMCan you DM me in telegram- @LT_MouseI'll send it soon. Thank you.You might as well post any details here. If you don't want to share url, then you could still post some basic info and stats, i.e. monthly traffic, average revenue, how much you expect to sell it for etc.It's hard for anyone to even say if they're interested if you only disclose the type of business.Just saying

comments.author: 2double0
comments.body: Is the website already up and running or are you just selling the script? If yes, what's its rank on Google? Is it listed there? Are there any other advertising platforms associated with the website or is it an Amazon-only site?My friend is a dealer in these things and he might be interested in buying your website if you share more details about it via PM or telegram if you are not comfortable here. You can find my telegram in my profile.

comments.author: roksana.hee
comments.body: This is golf related site. It's new and growing. I can't invest money there now—the site age is about 2 years.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: roksana.hee on January 28, 2023, 09:08:29 AMThis is golf related site. It's new and growing. I can't invest money there now—the site age is about 2 years.You can't say anything about traffic? Is it organic or whether it was achieved through paid advertising?it would also be desirable if we knew the approximate price you expect for it.if you really want to sell, you have to be a little more serviceable. if we have to ask you for every piece of information, then the whole thing becomes much more complicated. I don't know how many buyers have the desire to trade in such a way.I would suggest you try platforms dedicated to online business sales, such as Flippa or Sedo. or at least look at them, and see how similar offers are presented.

comments.author: roksana.hee
comments.body: Below I was sent the screenshot of uber suggest SEO ranking factors reports.1. https://prnt.sc/2uoVvw7zVZMu2. https://prnt.sc/aGhk-sQsJEbVyou can check.

comments.author: bnbstorm
comments.body: Quote from: roksana.hee on January 28, 2023, 05:45:42 PMBelow I was sent the screenshot of uber suggest SEO ranking factors reports.1. https://prnt.sc/2uoVvw7zVZMu2. https://prnt.sc/aGhk-sQsJEbVyou can check.As per screenshots 67 organic visitors per month is quite low traffic. It can be considered as almost new. Requires a lot of work to generate potential buyers.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: roksana.hee on January 28, 2023, 05:45:42 PMBelow I was sent the screenshot of uber suggest SEO ranking factors reports.1. https://prnt.sc/2uoVvw7zVZMu2. https://prnt.sc/aGhk-sQsJEbVyou can check.Isn't it better you drop the website URL and let others do their own research. You can even drop the expected price you are looking for. Make it simple.
